1370: Pietersen moved to Goetscalcstraet.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Gerart at age 18 in 1370.
Gave birth to Gisele in 1370 at age 18.
1371: Gave birth to Gerburgis in 1371 at age 19.
1372: Gave birth to Waldrada in 1372 at age 20.
1374: Gave birth to Salome in 1374 at age 22.
1375: Gave birth to Oderada in 1375 at age 23.
1377: Gave birth to Wijfgode in 1377 at age 25.
1379: Gave birth to Sybillia in 1379 at age 27.
1381: Lost daughter Sybillia when Sybillia was 3 years old.
1382: Gave birth to Reinardus in 1382 at age 30.
1394: Lost daughter Waldrada when Waldrada was 23 years old.
Lost daughter Wijfgode when Wijfgode was 18 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
